name: daily
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool foreca_weather.
Tool description: Everything you need to build a weather app
API description: Fetches daily weather forecast for a given location using the Foreca Weather API.

location.description: The location for which you want to fetch the weather forecast.

dataset.description: The dataset to use for the forecast. Defaults to 'full'.

tempunit.description: The temperature unit for the response. Defaults to 'C' for Celsius.

windunit.description: The wind speed unit for the response. Defaults to 'MS' for meters per second.

periods.description: Number of time steps for the forecast. Defaults to 8, with a maximum of 12.
